00238 class DrmROStoreSingleton
00239 {
00240 public:
00244     static DrmRightsObjectStore* Instance()
00245     {
00246         if (m_instance == NULL) m_instance = new DrmRightsObjectStore;
00247 
00248         ASSERT(m_instance != NULL);
00249 
00250         return m_instance;
00251     }
00252 
00256     static void DestroyInstance()
00257     {
00258         delete m_instance;
00259         m_instance = NULL;
00260     }
